reviews.title: Disappointed in the Trump Gary Hotel
reviews.text: I understand that the hotel is old, but it should be taken care of. The clock radio did not work, when we requested a new one nothing happened.

reviews.title: Better than I expected!!
reviews.text: After reading the reviews on this website, I was a little leary about staying at Trump Indiana Hotel when I made the reservation. But the there was a $120 price difference between Trump and Harrah's and we did not want to spend the extra.

reviews.title: Dump! Replace the TR with a D!
reviews.text: Four of us went and the age span was from 29 - 52 and all women. The dates stayed were 4/23 & 4/24.

reviews.title: A Place to Rest Your Head.....
reviews.text: The reservation I made was for a room on the highest floor and with a balcony facing the lake. That is exactly what we received. We stayed on the fourth floor with a balcony and faced the lake. It was a nice view, but we were not their to look at Lake Michigan, nor were we there to hang out in our hotel room.

reviews.title: Update of hotel
reviews.text: Check in went very quickly, they had our room ready and it came with passes for free breakfast buffet for everyone in the room.

reviews.title: trump casino
reviews.text: Our room was to our expectations. It was just what we needed, CLEAN... I did not inspect every corner of the room for rips or tears in the walls or blankets, so I did not see any. The only thing I thought was weird was the room did not have any kleenex?? Not a big deal though!!
